TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EntityDataReader extends System.Data.Common.DbDataReader implements class System.Data.IDataRecord, class System.Data.IExtendedDataRecord
Public Class EntityDataReader Inherits DbDataReader Implements IExtendedDataRecord
public ref class EntityDataReader : System::Data::Common::DbDataReader, System::Data::IExtendedDataRecord
type EntityDataReader = class inherit DbDataReader interface IExtendedDataRecord interface IDataRecord

summary.span: 从数据源中读取行的只进流。

span.span: Reads a forward-only stream of rows from a data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 组合了 类和 接口的功能。Combines the functionality of the class and the interface. 没有公共构造函数。An has no public constructor. 它只能通过方法重载之一来获取 `EntityCommand.ExecuteReader` 。It can only be obtained through one of the `EntityCommand.ExecuteReader` method overloads. SQL Server SQL Server puts output parameters from stored procedures at the end of the result stream, after all the result sets. 因此，为了获取输出参数值，应用程序必须耗用所有结果集中的所有记录。Therefore, to get output parameter values, an application must consume all the records in all the result sets. 如果应用程序关闭 （这将同时关闭 ），那么输出参数可能未填充值。If the application closes the (which would also close the ), output parameters might not be populated. 不会隐式耗用结果集以使输出参数可用。 does not implicitly consume result sets to make output parameters available. 因此，请注意以下几点：Therefore, note the following: - 只在显式调用 时才会调用 。 calls the only when is explicitly called. 如果 引发异常，则 会将其包装在 (或派生的异常) 中。If throws an exception, the will wrap it in an (or a derived exception). - 只关闭 ，而不使用任何挂起的记录或结果集。 only closes the , without consuming any pending records or result sets. - 只释放 ，而不使用任何挂起的记录或结果集。 only disposes of the , without consuming any pending records or result sets. 有关代码示例，请参阅使用 [EntityClient](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/bb738679(v=vs.90))。For code examples, see [Working with EntityClient](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/bb738679(v=vs.90)).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool NextResult() cil managed
Public Overrides Function NextResult () As Boolean

summary.span: 在读取一批语句的结果时，使读取器前进到下一个结果。

span.span: Advances the reader to the next result when reading the results of a batch of statements.

returns.span: 如果存在多个结果集，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if there are more result sets; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于处理向数据提供程序提交一批语句后返回的多个结果集。This method allows you to process multiple result sets returned when a batch is submitted to the data provider.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Read() cil managed
Public Overrides Function Read () As Boolean

summary.span: 使读取器前进到结果集中的下一条记录。

span.span: Advances the reader to the next record in a result set.

returns.span: 如果存在更多行，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if there are more rows; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据读取器的默认位置处于第一条记录之前。The default position of a data reader is before the first record. 因此，您必须调用 `Read` 以开始访问数据。Therefore, you must call `Read` to begin accessing data.

span.span: Working with EntityClient

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property RecordsAffected As Integer
public: virtual property int RecordsAffected { int get(); };

summary.span: 通过执行 SQL 语句获取更改、插入或删除的行数。

span.span: Gets the number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted by execution of the SQL statement.

value.span: 更改、插入或删除的行数。

span.span: The number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted.

value.span: 如果是 SELECT 语句，则返回 -1；如果未影响任何行或语句失败，则返回 0。

span.span: Returns -1 for SELECT statements; 0 if no rows were affected or the statement failed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 `RecordsAffected` 读取所有行并关闭之前，不会设置属性 `DataReader` 。The `RecordsAffected` property is not set until all rows are read and you close the `DataReader`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property VisibleFieldCount As Integer
public: virtual property int VisibleFieldCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取 中未隐藏的字段的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of fields in the that are not hidden.
The number of fields that are not hidden.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值用于确定 中的可见字段的数目。This value is used to determine how many fields in the are visible. 例如，对分部主键执行 SELECT 将以隐藏字段的形式返回该键的其余部分。For example, a SELECT on a partial primary key returns the remaining parts of the key as hidden fields. 隐藏的字段始终追加在可见字段之后。The hidden fields are always appended behind the visible fields.
